column4: is there any way to stop nm-applet from prompting the password (wpa wlan) every time i start my laptop?
it can, it is a keyring prompt,
there is a package for automatic keyring login
if so i have it installed
it is, because there is no such a package in intrepid
i have this package installed by default
habe you tried that your self?
what for it is the same as for log in
but do you have gnome-keyring installed?
